Text:
Hi,

Does not work for me, I use the 1.2; The EXE file of this torrent try to exec a .reg file which does not exist.

So I have downloaded and tried another crack, which reset the trial days; Just exec the program through it and enjoy en infinite 30 days trial x)

Link:
http://astalavista.box.sk/cgi-bin/robot?srch=crazybump&submit=+search+
I'm not exactly sure, but it might be possible you have to have winrar installed for this crack to work. Let me know if somebody can confirm this.

works great


Just download the 30 day trial, install it, copy the cb_crack.exe file to the installation directory and use that file to start Crazybump instead of the CrazyBump.exe. Every time you start it, it will automatically reset your evaluation period to the full 30 days.

Worked for me too!
Thank you so much!
I will try and Buy.
